text: Adrienne Jo Barbeau (born June 11, 1945) is an American actress, singer, and writer. She is known for her roles in Creepshow, Grease, and in Escape from New York. She is known for her television roles in Maude and in Batman: The Animated Series. Barbeau was born on June 11, 1945 in Sacramento, California. Her ancestry include Armenian, German, Irish, French, and Canadian. Barbeau was raised in San Jose, California. She studied at Del Mar High School. Barbeau was married to John Carpenter from 1979 until they divorced in 1984. Then she married Billy Van Zandt in 1992. She had one son with Carpenter and twin sons with Zandt. She now lives in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== *General Hospital Happenings Interview, A Word with Adrienne Barbeau (April 27, 2010) * * * *Adrienne Barbeau website Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Sacramento, California Category:Singers from Sacramento, California Category:Writers from Sacramento, California Category:Actors from San Jose, California Category:Musicians from San Jose, California Category:Writers from San Jose, California
title: Adrienne Barbeau
